Source code for fastai.metrics

from .imports import *
from .torch_imports import *


[docs]def accuracy_np(preds, targs):
    preds = np.argmax(preds, 1)

    return (preds==targs).mean()


[docs]def accuracy(preds, targs):
    preds = torch.max(preds, dim=1)[1]

    return (preds==targs).float().mean()


[docs]def accuracy_thresh(thresh):

    return lambda preds,targs: accuracy_multi(preds, targs, thresh)


[docs]def accuracy_multi(preds, targs, thresh):

    return ((preds>thresh).float()==targs).float().mean()


[docs]def accuracy_multi_np(preds, targs, thresh):

    return ((preds>thresh)==targs).mean()
